verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Holy holy, holy Lord,
God of hosts.
Heaven and earth,
heaven and earth,
are filled with your glory.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Hosanna, hosanna
hosanna in the highest,
hosanna hosanna.
in the highest. x2

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Blessed is he,
blessed is he
who comes
in the Lord's name. x2
